eventDecorators.name: NewFeedDecimalsForAsset
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

eventDecorators.name: NewFeedForAsset
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset to get the price of.

returnDecorators.description: The asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e(36 - assetDecimals)). Zero means the price is unavailable.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPriceUpdateTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Get the price update timestamp for the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset address for price update timestamp retrieval.

returnDecorators.description: Last price update timestamp for the asset.

functionDecorators.name: getUnderlyingPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get the underlying price of a cToken asset.

parameterDecorators.name: cToken
parameterDecorators.description: The cToken to get the underlying price of.

returnDecorators.description: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e(36 - assetDecimals)). Zero means the price is unavailable.

functionDecorators.name: getUnderlyingPriceUpdateTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Get the price update timestamp for the cToken underlying.

parameterDecorators.name: cToken
parameterDecorators.description: The cToken address for price update timestamp retrieval.

returnDecorators.description: Last price update timestamp for the cToken underlying asset.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
